pages.headline: 9' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 1, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: Celtic takes the lead early! Johnny Kenny scores from close range with a left-footed shot into the bottom corner. Reo Hatate provided the assist.

pages.headline: 50' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 2, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: What a strike from Kieran Tierney! The Celtic left-back unleashed a powerful left-footed shot from outside the box. The ball nestled perfectly into the bottom right corner, extending Celtic's lead to 2-0 against Kilmarnock.

pages.headline: 84' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 3, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: Celtic extends their lead! Daizen Maeda scores with a right-footed shot from the right side of the box, finding the bottom right corner. Arne Engels provided the assist with a precise through ball. The score now stands at 3-0 in the 85th minute.

pages.headline: 86' CHANCE! -- Attempt saved
pages.caption: Daizen Maeda (Celtic) unleashes a right-footed shot from outside the box in the 87th minute, but Kilmarnock's Eddie Beach makes a crucial save. Anthony Ralston provided the assist with a perfectly weighted through ball. The game remains tightly contested as the clock ticks down.

pages.headline: 91' PENALTY MISSED! -- Penalty conceded by James Brown (Kilmarnock) after a foul in the penalty area
pages.caption: A late penalty is awarded to Celtic after James Brown commits a foul in the penalty area. However, the Celtic player fails to convert the penalty, sending the ball wide of the goal. A huge let-off for Kilmarnock!

pages.headline: 91' PENALTY! -- Penalty Celtic
pages.caption: Penalty for Celtic! Yang Hyun-Jun wins a penalty after being fouled in the box. Big chance for Celtic to snatch a late goal.

pages.headline: 92' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 4, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: Goal! Arne Engels seals the victory for Celtic, converting a penalty with a precise right-footed shot into the bottom left corner. Celtic now lead Kilmarnock 4-0. The final whistle is about to blow on a dominant performance.
